attributes.action: Stop wasting tax payers money on climate change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems obvious that the planet has been heating up for millions of years now. For example, the English Channel was formed due to rising sea levels. Surely it is about time we accepted that climate change is a natural phenomenon and politicians debating the planets temperature rising by a couple of degrees over the next centuary is a waste of time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
